com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3.mvp

Class MvpActivity<V extends MvpView,P extends MvpPresenter<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3.mvp.MvpActivity<V,P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MvpDelegateCallback<V,P>, MvpView
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MvpLceActivity, MvpViewStateActivity

    public abstract class MvpActivity<V extends MvpView,P extends MvpPresenter<V>>
extends AppCompatActivity
implements MvpView, MvpDelegateCallback<V,P>
    An Activity that uses a MvpPresenter to implement a Model-View-Presenter architecture.
    Since:
    1.0.0

        public abstract P createPresenter()
        Instantiate a presenter instance
        Specified by:
        createPresenter in interface MvpDelegateCallback<V extends MvpView,P extends MvpPresenter<V>>
        Returns:
        The MvpPresenter for this view

      • getMvpDelegate

        protected ActivityMvpDelegate<V,P> getMvpDelegate()
        Get the mvp delegate. This is internally used for creating presenter, attaching and detaching view from presenter.

        Please note that only one instance of mvp delegate should be used per Activity instance.

        Only override this method if you really know what you are doing.

        Returns:
        ActivityMvpDelegateImpl

      • getPresenter

        public P getPresenter()
        Description copied from interface: MvpDelegateCallback
        Get the presenter. If null is returned, then a internally a new presenter instance gets created by calling MvpDelegateCallback.createPresenter()
        Specified by:
        getPresenter in interface MvpDelegateCallback<V extends MvpView,P extends MvpPresenter<V>>
        Returns:
        the presenter instance. can be null.

        Description copied from interface: MvpDelegateCallback
